task.summary: Adding intelliJ files. Dragging is not working yet.
GameThread in GameView keeping track of drawing by sleeping. Arbitrarily 30 frames / s.
Scrolling is working. But I want to punch android and also the drawing is way too slow. Need to look into performance tomorrow.
Made scrolling performance better. Still could look better / be faster.

Took out pauses. Docs seem to say that you don't need to pause regularly. Just draw as fast as you want to. Instead made a "needsDrawing" variable. http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/graphics/2d-graphics.html
Draws entire grid as a single path. Hence when a change occurs only need to offset 1 path. This might increase performance, not sure. Decreases "tearing" when you drag to move the grid.
Got tower attacking, game logic thread, + refactored to put globalOffset in HexGrid class cause it makes more sense that way.
goal hex, minor performance tweaks by reducing stuff in GameThread.drawGrid
Can touch to place towers. Attack different area.
initial popup is shown on grid
Got popup sorta working, going to attempt using TableLayout instead since GridLayout has lots of issues
fixed minor bug with the menu popping up within the screen bounds
